SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.1_1: bodhau nidhāyāvicalaṃ manaśca kuryāt parātmavyatihāram ādau //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.2_0: tataḥ paraṃ dānavidhau prayogaḥ kāryastathā lokahitonmukhena /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.2_1: yathā svagātrāṇyapi yācitasya na yogasaṃkocavirūpatā syāt //

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.5_0: saṃsmṛtya caryātiśayaṃ munīnāṃ tadunmukhīṃ svāmapi ca pratijñām /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.6_0: yadā nisṛṣṭo jagate mayāyaṃ kāyo 'pī tattyāgakṛto 'pi dharmaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.6_1: bāhye tadā vastuni saṅgacittaṃ na me gajasnānam ivānurūpam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.7_1: ahaṃ hi lokārthamidaṃ bibharmi śarīrakaṃ kiṃ bata vastu bāhyam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.9_0: tathaiva lokārthasamudyatena svalpo 'pi kāryo na mayā vikalpaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.9_1: duḥkhe kṛtaghne satatāśucau ca dehe parasmāyupayujyamāne //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.10_0: ādhyātmike caiva mahījalādye bāhye mahābhūtagaṇe ca tulye /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.10_1: idaṃ mamedaṃ na mameti ko 'yam ajñānapaṅkāṅkavidhirmayāpi //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.11_0: gṛhṇīta gātrāṇyapi me yatheṣṭaṃ mā kārṣurasmin parakīyabuddhim /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.11_1: yuṣmākameva svamidaṃ kimarthaṃ nātmābhimāno mama kaścidatra //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.13_0: evaṃ sa dānapratipattiśūraḥ karoti kāye 'pi na jātvapekṣām /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.15_1: bhavāndhakāre bhramatāṃ janānāṃ sūryodayāt spaṣṭataraṃ prakāśam //

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.18_1: sattvā mayā cāmiṣasaṃgṛhītāḥ saddharmapātrāṇyapi me bhaveyuḥ //

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.30_0: duḥkhāpagāyāmatiśīghragāyāṃ magnasya lokasya kathaṃ na dadyām /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.34_0: majjānamapyadbhutavīraceṣṭo dadāti lokasya kathaṃ na kuryām /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.37_0: na ca praṇīte sati rūkṣadānam adakṣiṇīyā iti vāvamanya /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.38_0: naivonnatiṃ śīlavate prayacchan viparyayaṃ gacchati netarasmai /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.39_1: na krodhadoṣopahataṃ dadāti naivānutāpaṃ kurute sa dattvā //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.40_0: na ślāghyamāno vipulaṃ dadāti nāślāghyamāno 'nyataraṃ dadāti /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.41_0: nākāladānaṃ sa dadāti kiṃcid dadāti kāle viṣame 'pi naiva /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.42_0: nāsau mukhollokanayā dadāti na kīrtiśabdāya na hāsyahetoḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.42_1: paryāptametacca mameti naivaṃ yadvā vihiṃsāhasitaṃ pareṣām //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.43_0: sarvajñabhāvāpariṇāmitaṃ vā sagarhitaṃ vā sa dadāti naiva /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.43_1: tato 'sya tat pāramitābhidhānaṃ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ samupaiti dānam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.44_0: dānodbhavaṃ tasya ca puṇyarāśiṃ lokāt samagrādapi piṇḍitāni /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.45_1: samantatastasya kutaḥ pramāṇaṃ parikṣayo vā satatapravṛtteḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.46_0: yadakṣayāṇāṃ jagatāṃ hitāya jñānasya hetuśca yadakṣayasya /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.46_1: traidhātukena kṣayiṇā na tacca saṃlipyate vyomavadambudena //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.48_0: asmin punaḥ satpuruṣāvadāne dāne nidāne sukhavistārāṇām /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.48_1: cikīrṣatā yogamanityasaṃjñā bhogeṣu kāryā karuṇā ca loke //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.49_0: bhogānanityānabhivīkṣamānaḥ sātmyaṃ gatāyāṃ ca tataḥ kṛpāyām /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.49_1: sa niścayaṃ gacchati dīyate yad etān madīyāṃ na tu yadgṛhe me //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.50_0: yaddattam asmān na bhayaṃ kadā cid gehe yadasmādbhayamabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.50_1: sādhāraṇaṃ rakṣyamatarpakaṃ ca datte tu naite prabhavantyanarthāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.51_0: sukhaṃ paratrāpi karoti dattam ihaiva duḥkhaṃ prakarotyadattam /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.51_1: ulkāsvabhāvaṃ hi dhanaṃ narāṇām atyajyamānaṃ vyasanaṃ dadāti //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.52_0: adīyamānaṃ nidhanaṃ prayāti nidhānatāṃ yāti hi dīyamānam /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.52_1: dhanasya niḥsāralaghoḥ sa sāro yaddīyate lokahitonmukhena //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.53_1: prāyo viyogo hi parigrahebhyo dānādbhavatyabhyudayo yaśaśca //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.54_1: yaddīyate satpatha eṣa tasmād ato 'nyathā kāpathamāhurāryāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.57_0: sa cetpunaryācanake 'pi labdhe dātuṃ na śaknotyatidurbalatvāt /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.58_0: kāryaśca mātsaryavinigrahāya mohaprahāṇāya ca tena yatnaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.58_1: tathā yathā yācanakaḥ kadā cid vaimukhyadīno na tato vyāpaiti //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.59_0: saṃbodhicittaṃ kuta eva tasya dravye 'pi yo matsaramabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.59_1: vāsaḥ sucittasya hi nāsti doṣairambhonidhānasya śavairyathaiva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.60_0: tasmāt tyaktvā sarvataḥ sarvadoṣān bodhiprārthī sarvadā sarvadaḥ syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.60_1: trātuṃ lokānekavīraḥ kva cittaṃ ceṣṭā dainyānūrjiteyaṃ kva caiva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_1.61_0: mūlaṃ dānasyāsya saṃbodhicittaṃ tanna tyājyaṃ ditsatā dānamīdṛk /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_2.1_1: svameva śīlaṃ pariśodhyamādau śīlaṃ hi śakterbalamādadhāti //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_2.2_0: loke tathā prema niveśayeta svapne 'pi na droharuciryathā syāt /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_2.14_0: anādadānastu parasya bhogān āpnoti bhogānmahataḥ paratra /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_3.1_0: saṃmohanīṃ manmathapakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhāṃ caiva vimokṣamāyām /

SA14bsa050_u:ps_3.36_1: tathānimittaṃ ca vimokṣaheturdure bhavatyasya yathā kṣiteḥ kham //

SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.13_1: saṃbuddhabhāve pariṇāmitasya tathaiva puṇyasya na saṃkṣayo 'sti //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.14_1: puṇyāni lokasya carācarasyetyevaṃ sa tānyārabhate susattvaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.15_1: kalpaṃ tathā naiva ca sattvadhātostenāpi kiṃ cit paripācitaṃ syāt //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.16_0: śrutvāpi sattvākṣayatāṃ imāṃ yaḥ sattvānaśeṣān vininīṣureva /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.18_0: śatena bhūyo guṇitena tena puṇyena romāspadasaṃśritena /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.22_0: ayaṃ mayā puṇyanidhiḥ parārthaṃ saṃceya ityuttamabodhicitte /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.23_0: sarve 'pi sattvā yadi lokadhātau pratyekabuddhaiḥ sadṛśā bhaveyuḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.23_1: jñānena tebhyo 'bhyadhikaprabhāvaḥ kṣāntistha eko 'pi hi bodhisattvaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.24_1: aśrāntavīryaḥ kuśalaprayoge yallaukike caiva taduttare ca //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.25_0: tebhyaḥ puṇaścādhika eva dūraṃ ya ekajātipratibaddhabodhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.25_1: ka eva vādo dṛḍhavīryavatsu ye bodhimūle prathamaṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.26_1: yāyāt kalāṃ so 'pi na bodhimūle sthitasya mārātikṛtāntyajāteḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.28_1: avyāhatājñaḥ paracittacāre prajñāvabhāsaṃ ca nabho viśālam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.29_0: sarveṣu sattveṣu ca tasya mātrā samānahārdā karuṇābhyudeti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.32_0: yo bodhicittapraṇayaḥ samaśca kṛpā ca nairātmagatau kṣamā ca /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.33_0: saṃsārapaṅke yadakhinnatā ca traidhātukasyaiva ca nopalabdhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.33_1: sarvasvadānaṃ na ca tena mānaḥ samagraśikṣasya na śikṣayā ca //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.36_0: yā deśanā caiva yathāśrutānāṃ jñānaṃ ca dharmānabhilāpyatāyām /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.36_1: pañcasvabhijñāsu ca yatprabhutvam abhyāsamātrā ca taduttarāyām //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.37_0: yadṛddhipādeṣvabhinirhṛtatvaṃ paṭvī na cāyāsamayī kriyā ca /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.37_1: samyakprahāṇeṣu ca yaḥ prayogaḥ śubhāśubhādeva ca yā vimuktiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.38_0: yatkauśalaṃ cendriyanirṇayeṣu nirindriyān paśyati yacca dharmān /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.38_1: mārgasya saṃbhāravimārgaṇaṃ ca na cāsya kiṃ cid gamanaṃ kutaścit //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.40_0: nimittakarmasvapi na pravartate vitiṣṭhate jñānamaye ca karmaṇi /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.40_1: kṛpāguṇādyan na jahāti saṃskṛtaṃ na coruvīryo 'pi patatyasaṃskṛte //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.42_0: vrajantyavandhyā yadaharniśaṃ kriyā guṇairna hāniṃ yadutpaiti mauśalīm /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.43_0: yaśo viśālam ca sukhaṃ sukhodayaṃ vinītakārpaṇyamanastvamuttamam /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.43_1: guṇāśca teṣāmiha dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti vīryāditi ko 'tra vismayaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_4.44_1: vīryavyāpāśrayadṛḍhāḥ puruṣā na syād ataḥ ka iva vīryaparaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.7_0: yatra kva cana vā deśe saṃsargakleśavarjite /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.9_0: prajñāparicayasyāyāṃ kālo me na tu nirvṛteḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.9_1: na hi sattvān anirvāpya svayaṃ nirvātum utsahe //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.12_0: ekatraiva ca badhnīyād dṛḍham ālambane manaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.24_1: hetubhūtā yataḥ kāmāḥ kāmayeta na tān ataḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.33_0: utplavaṃ manaso dṛṣṭvā prīteratha virajya saḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.35_0: abhijñā labhate pañca sa ca tatrānugāminīḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.49_1: vīkṣya vrajati kāruṇyaṃ teṣāṃ vāñcanayā tayā //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.59_1: dhanado dhanado yathā kva cit kuha cidbrahmavadadbhutadyutiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.62_1: garuḍadhvajarājadṛk kva cit kuha ciccaiva halāyudhadyutiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.64_1: vāruṇadyutim udvahan kva cit kuha cinmanmathacāruvigrahaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.65_1: kva cid eva tapodhanaśriyaṃ vidadhat kāmaviraktamānasaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.71_0: manasaḥ parivṛttilāghavaṃ paramaṃ tatra na viśvasedataḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.74_1: vyatiyāti tu māragocaraṃ tamanarthaṃ praśamayya sarvathā //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.75_1: calatānugato hi niśrayaḥ sakhaṭuṅkastata eva kathyate //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.76_1: na hi kiṃ cid udeti kutra cit sadasatsaṃbhavayuktyasaṃbhavāt //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_5.78_0: kurute sa ca laukikīṃ kriyāṃ jagadekāntahitānuvartinīm /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.2_0: kriyāsu sāmarthyaguṇaṃ hi teṣāṃ prajñaiva vistāriṇamādadhāti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.3_1: tathaiva kāryāṇi na bhānti loke prajñāviyogena jadīkṛtāni //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.4_1: guṇāguṇān vetti hi tatsanāthaḥ kleśakṣaye naipuṇametyataśca //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.5_1: tyāgaṃ parārthaṃ hi vadanti dānaṃ śeṣastu vṛddhyārthamiva prayogaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.6_1: naivonnatiṃ nāvanatiṃ prayānti bhaiṣajyavṛkṣā iva nirviklapāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.10_0: tataḥ paraṃ kāmiṣu daivateṣu loke 'pi ca dvitrisahasrasaṃkhye /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.10_1: aiśvaryamāpnoti tataḥ paraṃ ca bhūmiṃ viśodhya prabhavāṃ prabhāyāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.11_0: śīlasya śuddhiḥ kuta eva tasya yaḥ prajñayā nāpahṛtāndhakāraḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.11_1: prāyeṇa śīlāni hi tadviyogād āmarṣadoṣaiḥ kaluṣīkriyante //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.12_0: nātmārthamapyasti tu yasya śīlaṃ prājñasya tasyāsti kathaṃ parārtham /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.12_1: yo dṛṣṭadoṣo bhavabandhanānāṃ lokān samastāṃstata ujjihīrṣuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.13_0: prajñāvipakṣairhṛdi soparāge kṣamāguṇaḥ kena dhṛtiṃ labheta /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.14_0: prajñānvitānāṃ tu parāpakārāḥ kṣamāguṇāḥ sthairyakarā bhavanti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.15_0: niṣkevalaṃ vīryamapi śramāya prajñāsanāthasya tu tasya kārye /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.16_0: yasmāt paraṃ sūkṣamataraṃ na kiṃ cid yannaipuṇānāṃ paramaḥ prakarṣaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.18_0: prajñānirudyogamaterhi dṛṣṭirnāyāti śuddhiṃ tadṛte na śīlam /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.19_0: prājñastu doṣādbhayamīkṣamāṇaḥ sukhānubaddhaṃ ca sukhaṃ guṇebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.21_1: naiṣkāraṇorjasvalayā ca vṛttyā parārthacaryāsu samaṃ samantāt //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.22_0: sāmānyamartheṣu ca darśayitvā premṇā vaśīkṛtya manāṃsi teṣām /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.24_0: bhayāni sarvāṇi hi doṣajāni prajñā na doṣaiḥ sahavāsameti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.26_0: na tatra bhūyaḥ karaṇīyam asti yatra prabhā sā balatāmupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.26_1: yugāntakālānalasaṃhṛte hi loke na dagdhavyakathāḥ prathante //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.28_0: saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti sukhena śikṣā śīlāya cittapraśamāya caiva /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.31_0: prajñābalaṃ dīptataraprabhāvaṃ nālaṃ prasoḍhuṃ sabalo 'pi māraḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.31_1: prajñāṃśavo vibhramayānti cakṣurna draṣṭum īśo hi yataḥ sa eva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.33_0: adhīrasātmyaṃ bhayaviklavaṃ vā mūḍhocitaṃ śokaparigrahaṃ vā /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.34_0: dīneṣu kārpaṇyamalīmasatvaṃ kṛtāspadaṃ rāgiṣu cāpalaṃ vā /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.38_0: avāpya yasmān muniyauvarājyaṃ samaṃ samantād visṛtātmabhāvaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.38_1: lokasya duḥkhaṃ praśamatyayatnād rajo mahāmegha iva pravṛṣṭaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.39_1: ko vismayo vātra sutapriyāyā mātuḥ samīyādyadiyaṃ vibhūtiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.42_0: paryāyacitraṃ ca vimokṣamārgaṃ tattacca lokasya hitopapādi /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.43_1: na yadvirūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ vrajanti prajñā guṇāmātyasanāthatā sā //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.44_1: parasya duḥkheṣu parā dayā ca na śokabhārālasatāṃ gatā ca //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.46_0: ko nāma lokasya parārthasādhurduḥkhaikahetūni tamāṃsi hanyāt /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.46_1: avyāhatā jñānaśayāśayeṣu prajñā na cet syādatisūryādīptiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.47_0: tatprāptaye śrutam aśītivikalpacitraṃ saṃceyam āśrayasahaṃ gurumabhyupetya /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.48_0: alpaśruto 'ndha iva vetti na bhāvanāyā mārgaṃ vicintayati kāni ca tadvihīnaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.48_1: tasmācchrutaṃ prati yateta tadāśrayā hi prajñā samudbhavati cintanabhāvanābhyām //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.49_1: prajñāvivṛddhimabhitaḥ prayateta nityaṃ dhyānena tadguṇavivṛddhikareṇa caiva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.50_1: tābhyāṃ samudbhavati hi prabhavo guṇānāṃ prajñāprabhāsamudayo 'gnirivāraṇībhyāṃ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.51_1: tairāvṛto na hi vibhātyudayasthito 'pi toyāvalambijaladāntaritaḥ śaśīva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.53_1: mithyāvikalpapaṭutā vitathā ca dṛṣṭirmohāya tatpraśamanāya tu tadvipakṣāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.54_0: skandheṣu sāyatanadhātuṣu satyayuktyor; hetudbhaveṣu śucayānavinirṇaye ca /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.54_1: dharmeṣu kauśalamaśeṣata eva yacca prajñāprayogaviṣayo 'ṣṭavikalpa eṣaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.55_0: niḥsāraphenanicayairaviśeṣi rūpaṃ tisro 'pi budbudalavā iva vedanāśca /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.55_1: saṃjñāpi kāmaguṇaviprasṛtān satṛṣṇān bālān mṛgāniva vilobhayate marīciḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.56_0: saṃskārajātirapi tulyaguṇā kadalyā vijñānato 'pi na ca yuktatarāsti māyā /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.57_0: nātmā tadīyamapi cātra na kiṃ cid asti saṃghāta eṣa vividhāśūcisaṃnidhānaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.57_1: bālān pralambhayata eva ca sattvasaṃjñā svacchandaceṣṭa iva yantravidhau suyukte //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.58_0: ātmā na cakṣurapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāt tadvan na cakṣuṣi na cātra yathaiva cakṣuḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.58_1: ādhyātmikāyatanaśeṣam aśeṣam evam ātmīyavastuviṣayo 'pi ca tadvivekī //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.59_0: bāhyeṣu dhātuṣu śarīrasamāśritānāṃ nālpo 'pi lakṣaṇavirodhakṛto 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.59_1: vijñānadhāturapi ca kṣaṇikaḥ sa nātmā tasmātparo 'pi ca nabhaḥkusumaiḥ samānaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.60_0: ityetadudbhavati kevalameva duḥkhaṃ tṛṣṇāvimūḍhamanaso vigmāttu tasyāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.60_1: śāntiḥ parā bhavati tarṣaharastu mārgaḥ śīlaṃ samādhipariśuddhatayā ca dṛṣṭiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.61_0: tattatpratītya bhavatīti viśuddhadṛṣṭirnāstyasti veti samupaiti sa naiva kiṃ cit /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.61_1: māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.62_0: āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.62_1: evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.63_1: tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.66_0: hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.66_1: saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.67_0: svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.67_1: ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.69_1: lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.70_1: nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.71_1: tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.72_1: sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.73_1: cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam //
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.74_0: prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:ps_6.74_1: naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi //
